Wherever you are in the UK, our website has lots ideas to inspire, educate and motivate us all to take action.@Calderdale @EnvAgencyYNE @NatFloodForum @floodmary @flood_serv @floodguidance @CentreFlood @TheFloodHub

Never put wet wipes, cotton pads or kitchen roll down the toilet.

They don't break down in the same way as toilet paper - leading to blocked sewers. Only flush the 3 Ps - pee, poo and toilet paper.

Share the video to let others know¬†how to protect¬†their¬†pipes this #Unblocktober https://t.co/2fGsxkivfv
